Reviews.Author: wmellott
Reviews.Content: I would give this a 5 star rating if it was able to run Flash.  Too many websites that require Flash to fully appreciate them, but besides that I can't tell you the last time I touched my home laptop!  It's light, thin, and the battery lasts for a long time!

Reviews.Title: IPad2
Reviews.Author: Shirl/nSC
Reviews.Content: The only thing I needed to do was upload the latest version, 5.01, which is free when you call 1-800-APLCARE for help to upload, if you need help.  It is such a great tool for my work in real estate, or any other occasion for that matter!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: SanFresco
Reviews.Content: Love the ipad as it is so easy to navigate and very handy to use anywhere around the house. It is lightweight and turns on fast. The OS is easy to use as well and also easy to navigate. I have an android phone so this is a nice change. The tablets use Android OS which I am not crazy about. This is the one to get.

Reviews.Title: A rather fun distraction and way to convince myself I'm not blocked at school
Reviews.Author: a gentle sound
Reviews.Content: This was an unexpected gift. In truth I'm buying Fires for my own kids (love them) and intended one day to get one myself. So when I was given the ipad it was a serious shock. That said I use it at my school where things are mostly blocked. It's so vivid and I can hold it up close and see it so well. The screen is vibrant.I prefer the Fire for my kids actually and wish I had a set of these to teach with. Too bad my school in a poverty area can't wrangle that.All I can say is the thought of not having this for kids seems luddite.

Reviews.Title: I enjoy it
Reviews.Author: Brandon J. Hall "Rationalism & Logicality pro...
Reviews.Content: I wanted a lightweight tablet to replace my laptop for school use, and after weighing my options, I decided on the iPad 2 over the Samsung Galaxy tab because Apples appstore is alot more disverse and expansive. With apps like Documents To Go Premium and AVPlayerHD, it has almost completely replaced my laptop, and with the keyboard/case combo I ordered it does word processing just fine. It does pretty well with the battery life at mid-level brightness and does terrific on the lowest setting. Im a college student and Im at school for 12 hours on some days, so time is factor and it delievers.My one big issue with the iPad is its restrictions. You can not drag and drop items like word documents, images, pdf's, videos to and from the ipad without itunes, and because the iPad natively only plays a few video formats, you have to download an app if you want a broader selection. AVPlayerHD plays all video formats and actually allows you to drag these files into the sharing option in itunes. Which makes the device feel much more diverse, but the app isnt free, its about 1.99 in the appstore. Aside from the restriction issue I really like it, it hasnt completely replaced laptop, not until your able to transfer items without the use of iTunes.(There are apps like AVPlayerHD that allow you to transfer  certain incompatible files to your ipad through iTunes, and Im sure there are some for photos and documents, but you'll have to hunt for them down and they probably wont be free -but I guess if you can afford to shell out the dough for an iPad you can afford a couple 1 to 10 dollar apps-)I reccomend the iPad, its pretty cool.*Update*I got my iPad on Jan 14th, 2012 and got rid of it February 12th, 2012. It was very fun for awhile, but once the novelty wore off the iPad was just too limited. I needed more freedom and less hassle, I'm not a fan of going through iTunes for virtually all data transferring. I cant hook anything up to it without some ridiculous peripheral; something as simple as an SD or MicroSD card slot could have made a world of difference, my model was 16 gig. After the iOS 5 update it was down to about 13, and I had over 6 gigs for music and 8 for previous iPod touch apps.I had tons of movies but with the limited none expandable space, I could only fit about three compressed movies at a time, which were greatly smaller in size compared to anything offered in the iTunes store. I greatly regret not going with the Galaxy Tab, which in terms of flexibility is incredibly superior, however, neither of these are computers so the overall flexibility I prefer might never be on that level. That said, I probably should have gone with the Galaxy, although, the iPad was very fun, it wasn't for me.

Reviews.Title: Nice, easy to use, and a great invention
Reviews.Author: Patricia Brouillette
Reviews.Content: This is definitely worth the money. I don't have to be running to my computer. It is very portable, so unlike your desktop computer, you can take it to any room. Unless you are doing a lot on the actual road away from WiFi, there is not much reason to get one with 3G. Between IMessage and FaceTime it makes it worth it for my 5 1/2 year old daughter to keep in touch with Grammy and Grandpa, who live in a different state. She likes to talk to them while eating dinner, so I would rather have her eat near this than my computer.

Reviews.Title: excellent hardware and service
Reviews.Author: Caminante
Reviews.Content: I bought the iPad for my wife. If you're not a Mac user, it might be a little difficult to get used to, at first, as it was for her. However, it's well worth the learning effort. After an initial slow, but fun orientation and adjustment period, she loves it. It's fun, attractive, and pretty funciontal. I found it was not good for doing my homework asssignments and heavy duty work, because of its small size and onscreen keyboard (not effecctive if you really know how to type). However, once we added a bluetooth keyboard, I thought that it really could be a good "only" computer for anyone but a hard core document writer. I certainly would consider it for myself, as a travel and meeting device, but I'm still not giving up the big comfortable screen on my desk in the office. One more important note. Customer service is superb to any I've used anywhere in my life. Representatives are friendly, responsive, well-educated and just good folks. Thanks, Mac.

Reviews.Title: A tablet-sized iPhone, sans phone
Reviews.Author: Dane Alexander "Dane"
Reviews.Content: Like most, I've been smitten by the iPad since it was released about two years ago. I couldn't justify purchasing it for the longest time because I couldn't figure out how to work it into my technology regime. It's not computer enough to replace my Macbook Pro, and it's not phone enough to replace my iPhone 4 (not the 4S) running 5.0.1. When you factor in the price, I just couldn't convince myself that the iPad was something I couldn't live without.Then the iPad 2 comes out: front- and rear-facing cameras were new, so I could use the iPad for face-timing my mom 14 hours away, but it was essentially still something halfway between a computer and an iPhone.Finally I came to a point where I could spare the $600+ dollars to purchase the cheapest iPad 2 capable of connecting to at&t;'s 3G wireless service. I ordered this iPad on January 18 and just received it yesterday, so keep in mind I've only had this thing for one day.Immediately, I can see how the iPad 2 may come off as seductive; essentially, it's a ginormous screen surrounded by a thin frame of black or white (depends on which color your purchase--I bought white) with a single button. There's no denying that it's sexy. When you turn it on (after plugging it into iTunes and completing the necessary setup) you're blown away by the crisp screen--though it's not yet on par with the Retina display of the iPhone 4 and 4S, it's a luscious screen and only the seasoned 'techie' would notice this slight inferiority. The iPad 2's screen is still better than most if not all its competition.Apple also has a leg-up on its competition with the easy integration with iTunes. If your like me and you bought the iPad 2 to simply be what it is: an iPad, somewhere in between a computer and an iPhone--then you likely won't be filling your iPad 2's limited storage with your entire music library. I opted to sync with only my recently played music, top played music, recently added music, and a few recent playlist I've made, which I'll probably replace with newer playlists as they're made. I did sync with a fair amount of the same apps that I have on my iPhone, a handful of movies, none of my ringtones (what would I use them for?) and ended up using about 9GB of the 16GB available on the iPad 2 model I purchased. And in all actuality, after the firmware files and other junk Apple puts on their products, only about 13-14GB of the 16 are available to use out of the box.As expected, web browsing and email are where the iPad 2 shines. It's very smooth, the screen shows side-screens and sub-menus simultaneously, which really makes this thing quick to use. I used a Best Buy gift card I received for Christmas to purchase Apple's aluminum wireless keyboard to connect to my iPad 2 via Bluetooth and, although the keyboard makes me occasionally reach over for a mouse (you must still use the touch-screen mechanism despite having an actual keyboard), typing is a DREAM on here now! Facebook is also very fun to use with the keyboard setup versus the onscreen keyboard or even using the Facebook app on my iPhone. Don't get me wrong, the onscreen keyboard of the iPad 2 is very usable, but I find with a screen as large as the iPad 2's, I'd prefer having an actual keyboard so as to utilize as much of the screen as possible for web browsing, emailing, Facebooking, and anything else.I wish Apple would make it more clear that for at&t; 3G models, the SIM card is not included and will need to be purchased separately. I haven't gotten around to going to my local at&t; store to pick one up, so I'm not too sure how much a SIM card will cost.All things considered, so far I'd say I'm happy that I purchased the iPad 2. It's only receiving 4 of the 5 stars because, although I'm very comfortable with using it and definitely see myself using it on a daily basis, it hasn't replaced any of my other electronics. In all actuality, it's become another separate electronic device that I've incorporated into my routine for its own purposes. The 4 of 5 stars also reflects the price; I understand that you 'get what you pay for' (which is definitely the case for the iPad 2, as it outperforms the competition on every aspect except price), but for a product to ADD to your routine rather than to REPLACE or SIMPLIFY, I think the price could come down just slightly. Even a difference of $50 might be enough to lure in some hesitant customers.

Reviews.Title: Really nice product
Reviews.Author: Phandaal
Reviews.Content: I ordered the IPAD2 3 days ago for my mother, 75 years old.She really enjoys it and like how user friendly it is. She spent hours on it already, listening to music and using the apps I installed for her.I would recommend the Ipad2 for everyone that is not really concerned about the limitations (no flash, limited customization, necessity to go through Itunes for everything...)Display is nice, sound quality is good and it is really easy to use for older people.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: lulupats
Reviews.Content: This was an amazingly easy process.  Amazon site very user friendly and efficient.  Product arrived on time and without mishap.  Beautiful condition.  We are very happy!

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: Shelly
Reviews.Content: I really like looking at pictures with this thing when I am on the couch or on the move.  It really is a great tool that I have fallen in love with.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds Expectations-  I'm now a beliver
Reviews.Author: OPFL
Reviews.Content: I have always been resistant to anything Apple. However, this ipad has converted me.  It really is at a new level of "user-friendly" and has logical and efficient features.  I can't keep it away from my kids for very long.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: KennyD
Reviews.Content: The I-Pad2 is well worth the money and is one that I don't leave home without. I work in the Middle East and have long travel times and the I-Pad2 has been a lifesaver.  It works great and I love it... and would recomend it to anyone looking.  I'm glad that I did not get the black, the white is cheaper and after you put the protective cover (which I highly recommend) on it, who can tell what the color is.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: Bought a second hand apple ipad 2.  It is an excellent product.  It is used but looks new.  I will use amazon and secondipity again.  It is more than I expected.  I trust Amazon and have completed many major purchases through them.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Grant b
Reviews.Content: Amazing fast and on time. This iPad 2 was spotless and $250 cheaper thank you for a great Christmas present for my gf on a budget! ********* please offer delivery confirmation the iPad sat on the porch for 5 hours, I was really surprised it wasn't stolen**************

Reviews.Title: Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Isabel M. Corniel
Reviews.Content: The Ipad was in great condition love it the $$ pay for it was worth. It was for a give and my boyfriend was very happy with it didn't even noticed that was used..

Reviews.Title: Super fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Klaudeczka
Reviews.Content: My IPad arrived super fast even though I choose the free, standard shipping option. Very hapy with the purchase. Tablet came in a brand new condition - as described by the seller.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Gaurav
Reviews.Content: I took a long time deciding which tablet to buy and had narrowed down to Motorola Xoom, Sony Tablet S and iPad 2. I tried out all 3 and a few more tablets before choosing the iPad 2. I bought the iPad because-1. Navigation was smooth with the iPad. With all other tablets, I noticed that the tablet would not react to the touch every once in a while.2. The tablet is for my wife. iOS is much more intuitive than Android when it comes to tablets. the complexity of use of Android is fine for techies, though.3. Assurance of OS upgrade. I know that my iPad 2 would be compatible with future versions of iOS and that Apple would allow free upgrades. At the time of my purchase, I wasn't so sure about Android based tablets (looking at how many Android based cellphones dont get timely OS upgrades)4. Flaws in other tablets. Every other tablet has flaws, which is pretty disappointing. Xoom is good, but they dont deliver what they promise (Read up on Xoom users' agony over the micro SD unusability for over 6 months). Sony tablet doesn't come with 3G.Reasons why I took so long before buying the iPad:1. Dependence on iTunes2. No SD input3. Heavy price of accessories (like the one for connecting iPad to a TV)But in the end, it was worth it. Now I rarely open my PC; I just find it too bulky and slow now. :)

Reviews.Title: not that "user friendly"
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: not all that user friendly; had to go to apple store more than once for help; told not to use voice over feature--creates problems;  not able to have books read to me while jogging or driving--except audiobooks--somewhat disappointing. Probably better for people more IT savvy

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product, But A Few Flaws
Reviews.Author: 24_fan
Reviews.Content: I had won an iPad 2 a few months ago by filling out a survey. Overall, i am very happy with the iPad 2. It is the 32GB model, so i have the extra storage. I have at least 70 apps and 3 songs and no videos on it and i only use up about 10GB so far. The ability to back up all of your documents, apps, music, etc. ti iCloud is a great feature. You get 5GB of free storage but then you can buy additional storage if you need it.EmailThe ability to check email on it is a great feature. I use the Xfinity Mobile App instead of the mail app though so the emails will delete and be marked as read on my computer too, not just my iPad.WebThe ability to go on the web right from my iPad is also another great feature. If i need to look something up real quick i can just use the iPad instead of waiting for my computer to boot up.PrintingOne area that the iPad does need improvement in is the ability to print from it. We originally had a WiFi printer from Lexmark but did not have Airprint in it which is what you need to print from the iPad. So, i went to the store and bought a Kodak printer that says you can print from iPod, iPad, iPhone on it. I thought that that means that it has Airprint which is what you need to print from the iPad. Come to find out it doesn't have Airprint in it, BUT, you can download an app that lets you print from your iPad. So i get the printer all set up, connect it to my network, and try out the app. You need to save a screenshot of the screen you want to print from, the send it to the app which sends it to the printer, and it worked fine. Was just hoping i could use Airprint, but maybe next time.Flash PlayerI was a little dissapointed to find out that the iPad doesn't have a flash player built in. I can't open emails with videos in it or stuff on the web that requires flash player. I think apple should put built in flash player on the iPad, beacuse if they are going to compete against the Kindle Fire which has flash player, then they should seriously consider flash player. If you need a device that has a flash player, go with Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Nice ipad.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Andrews
Reviews.Content: The only thing bad about this iPad2 is that it is easy to slip out of your hands so you had better get a case for it. A rubberized finish might be better. Otherwise it is just what I expected. I have the Verizon and wi-fi version.

Reviews.Title: iPad2 Ordered from Amazon
Reviews.Author: S. E. Brubaker
Reviews.Content: Wow, what a fantastic piece of equipment.  After having an iPhone, it is very easy to use.  Wife and I will be fighting over it for sure.  Also, item shipped and was received promptly.

Reviews.Title: The iPad is a factastic item
Reviews.Author: Patrick H Reardon
Reviews.Content: I bought the iPAD 2 for my wife for Christmas. She is SOO happy with it and so am I. I plan to buy one for myself. Great product and a great deal from Amazon.com.Dr. Patrick H Reardon

Reviews.Title: Can't be beat, what else is there to say
Reviews.Author: Andrew A. Dillard
Reviews.Content: There's not much more to add to the benefit of owning a Ipad.  I bought this for my wife's birthday and the possibilities it allows are limitless.  Couple the Ipad or any apple product you have with Apple TV in your home and you have the capability to eradicate cable television and their monopoly from your list of home services.  Great product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Orledy Galaviz
Reviews.Content: Loving my ipad! I got it pretty fast? Highly recomendedIt was what i paid for. Desde venezuela caracas. It came with the newest software

Reviews.Title: I PAD 2
Reviews.Author: michael t.
Reviews.Content: In one word, super, does everything as advertised. My wife (X-MAS gift) loves it, she takes it every where. It worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Awesome gift!
Reviews.Author: Shando
Reviews.Content: I purchased this iPad2 for my husband for Christmas. I was at first hesitant to purchase online and not from a local retailer. However, I was thoroughly impressed. The iPad 2 came brand new still in a shrink-wrapped box. The device has worked flawlessy for the last two weeks. I would recommend this seller to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Glad I didn't settle for less
Reviews.Author: dkubecka
Reviews.Content: The iPad 2 is an excellent tablet.  It does everything I expected and with a few free apps does even more.  I sure am glad I didn't settle for something less.  The seller delivered very quickly and as ordered.

Reviews.Title: Loads of Fun
Reviews.Author: A. J. Herring "Daemon"
Reviews.Content: I won't hash out the technical specs and details like other reviewers have probably done a few times before me.I love my iPad 2. My girlfriend just got me one for our anniversary. Funny thing is she just got one from her mom for Christmas at my suggestion. So now we both have one.She just recently got wifi at work, too. She takes hers to work. She tends to call me about 3-4 times a day (at least it feels like that) and now she can call me on her iPad using Facetime, so she can see me as well. I don't really know how I feel about that feature sometimes, but it's pretty cool. I have other friends with iPads and iPhones and stuff, so we can all Facetime just like a house phone. It takes a little more effort to use it (just like Skype), but it's a really cool native app to the iPad. The camera quality is a bit to be desired. I think my Mac has a better camera than the iPad.Anyway, I'm not giving a review of Facetime. The iPad 2 is fast. The screen is pretty large compared to my iPod touch and my Droid X. It works well as a reader. The games work well on it. I've even used it as a drawing tablet a few times. I would link a photo I've drawn in my review, but I'm not sure I can do that.The browser works just as well as it does on my Mac and my iPod touch. It's not the best thing in the world, but it works well.Mail is still a problem for me. I can't get my Yahoo to work and I can't actually divulge why. I know the reason why and I'm not willing to fix it because it could be a slight security risk. Gmail works fine for me. I can't get my work e-mail to work either, but I haven't messed with it enough to really determine the reason just yet.The iPads are great to have around to watch Netflix and things like that. Especially when there is a toddler that wants to watch something and everyone else is watching something on the big screen.Finally, the iPads are very expensive. So far my experience with Apple in the past few years is that they build a quality product and it tends to be worth it. I hope they continue this trend. I can't say whether or not it was worth the cost as I didn't shell out the money this time. I can only say that I'm enjoying the product and I'm very happy to have it.

Reviews.Title: Great produce
Reviews.Author: Evilsanta
Reviews.Content: The ipad2 is awesome, fast, nice camera. only down side is that there's currently no jailbreak available for this model. unless it's the earliest firmware.

Reviews.Title: Just A pity with iOs5.0.1
Reviews.Author: Zyx Zy "Zyx Zy"
Reviews.Content: No quality problems, works very well and love it! Everyone knows iPad so I did need to said what that is. The ID fit the apple' ID.Just a little pity because it have an ios5.0.1 in it,Waiting for ios5 jealbreak.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2: An Exceptional Product
Reviews.Author: Penguin2013
Reviews.Content: I purchased the iPad 2 and was pleased with all the features it can offer. I am able to surf the web on Safara, play a plethora of games from the massive app store selection, check my stocks, and many many more. I now find watching videos on it a big plus as well. Compared to the new Kindle Fire, I have to say the iPad 2 is still much faster with its A5 processor and much better looking. I highly recommend this product as it leads the family of tablet technologies. Overall, a popular and renowned product. 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Richard Eller
Reviews.Content: Love this device. Presentations to my clients, prospects and internal resources has been received with great paise. 90% of computer tasks are now complete and delivered from the iPad. Besides the awesome business task, it has made a great entertainment option for the family while traveling and I use the kindle ap to read as well. The most versatile technology device on the market.

Reviews.Title: 4th one!  Excellent seller!
Reviews.Author: North Gate Outlander
Reviews.Content: My husband and I love our IPads!First I purchased a 16G, but used up most of the space with books, music and pictures.  So my husband got that one and I purchased a 64G (model 1). Love it.  Then I was fortunate to have another loaned to me as part of a Board of Directors (it sounds like an expensive prop, but considering the copying, etc., storing of paperwork, and all else that goes into a Directorship, this is a real bargain!).Then we continued to have issues with our ISP, and would go days w/o internet service, so I felt it was necessary to move up to an IPad 2 with Verizon.I just couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Can't live without this!
Reviews.Author: Ronald Fung
Reviews.Content: Great product ! Didn't think I needed a tablet, but now I can't go anywhere without it. Takes a little time to get used to but very simple to operate. Great apps for almost anything. Graphics are great too.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jerry T. Williamson
Reviews.Content: When coupled with Bluetooth keyboard more than efficient enough for web surfing basic word processing etc.  Definitely recommend to anyone who craves portability

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant to spend this much however I really enjoy the product. I already have an Iphone yet having a much larger screen is very useful.

Reviews.Title: Loving it so far...
Reviews.Author: Jamie Campbell
Reviews.Content: My order arrived faster than I expected. It seemed really easy to get it set up and start using. The only trouble I had was with iTunes and trying to get my music transferred over but I think that's me and not the iPad. So far, I'm loving it but I've only had it for a few days. Would have given it 5 stars but it cost $20 more than if I had bought it at the store. Pay the price for convenience I guess.

Reviews.Title: Amazed
Reviews.Author: Frugal Guy
Reviews.Content: I am really amazed at ipad on what it can do with this tiny processor. Browsing the web sometimes is noticeably slow, but it is not much worse than the experience on a powerfull windows machine.Good job.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: raidergrl15
Reviews.Content: This is a great product, faster and lighter than the first generation. I still wish it had adobe flash, but it is still amazing and it is very user friendly...amazon has the best deals for used electronics, the iPad is so new buying it used was a great deal :)

Reviews.Title: Loved the Apple iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Joaquin Delafuente
Reviews.Content: I purchased as a birthday gift for my wife she loves it, takes it everywhere she goes. with the wi-fi and the 32 gb hard drive this has replaced her laptop!

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Darlinn
Reviews.Content: I bought this Ipad2 as a gift for a friend in Canada. Make sure that you specify if its going to be a gift because he had to pay a duty on it. Other than that he raves about how wonderful it is and I have one as well. We video chat on it all the time and it makes it so much easier to keep in contact with me living in Saudi arabia and him in Canada.

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: Wolf
Reviews.Content: Cool thing, before I used just the ipod, but one is aging and your eyes need larger image. I'm very happy. I can only recommend.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!
Reviews.Author: Snick "Snick"
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad.  It's easy to read, not too big and it goes everywhere with me.  I'm glad I bought it.  It holds a charge well also.  Once you have charged the iPad, that charge will last for more than a day or two (depending how much you read).  I plug mine in every night before bed and it's ready the next morning.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Meshari
Reviews.Content: I bought this device a month ago, and so far I find no problem using it.Honestly, I prefer the galaxy tap. I used them both. Samsung apps are better, cheaper and more plentiful.I give it five stars because the shipping was so fast.I love it.

Reviews.Title: I Am Loving My New Toy
Reviews.Author: BrotherSpider "Spider"
Reviews.Content: i fought long and hard about it and then realized that i was spending as much money on Blu Ray as i would getting this thing. ok, so Netflix streaming isn't going to replace Blu Ray any time soon, but now i have another option.I just spent 2.5 hours in dialysis streaming ST:DS8 and it hardly put a dent in my power. that battery will last a LONG tmepicture quality is good, but i recomend an anti glare screen to go on it too.this is a cool gizmo and i love those angry birds

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: NYRJessica
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best "gadgets" I have ever purchased. It's mobile, versatile, and easy to use.  Wild have given 5 stars if it had a better camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: kristina holt
Reviews.Content: Great Response and Excellent Customer Service very pleased with my ipad2 if you ever have any questions always contact Bob he is a great and very quick and responsive manager couldnt be more pleased

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Adam B. Shaeffer "ashaef"
Reviews.Content: After nearly 6 months of everyday use, I love this device. It still isn't a full-fledged replacement for a computer, but it's close. iOS 5 is a great step toward that kind of functionality and further improves a product I already loved. I use it for classes, entertainment, work, and as an interactive toy for my 2 year-old son. He LOVES the Sandra Boynton apps and is confused by the physical book versions since the characters don't move like they do on the iPad 2.This was a great purchase for me and my family that we will enjoy for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service
Reviews.Author: Mo 1986
Reviews.Content: IPad is a great product but this review is more about the prices, the phenominal serviceand no hassle shopping that Amazon offers. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Good Customer Service and High Quality Product
Reviews.Author: A. Narine "almonetts"
Reviews.Content: Great service, product arrived in good order and timely fashion. Product is functional, thus far. Supplier also had good follow-up and follow-through.

Reviews.Title: Awesome ipad
Reviews.Author: Oettinger
Reviews.Content: Excellent product very happy with it. The battery last much longer than the first edition of ipad,better resolution and excellent camera. The only bad thing Apple should send you a free cover because of what your paying.

Reviews.Title: Tablets, great as a second screen for a laptop (I just happen to like the iPad 2 the best*)
Reviews.Author: Chris J
Reviews.Content: I wanted to focus a bit on just one thing I love about tablets. They provide you a very portable second screen. I happened to pick the iPad 2 after a lot of research with other tablets.I am away from home a lot during the day for work and class and also at night as I study. As a college student and future programmer I love having the iPad as a second screen. I can have my Kindle and PDF textbooks, web tutorials or HTML help apps open on the iPad as I type notes and program on my laptop. I am not constantly having to minimize or switch between windows on my laptop screen, which is pretty nice. I can also have Netflix, the ABC app or Hulu playing as I do homework. The small size of the iPad allows for me to slip it right into the same case as my laptop, awesome! They have some laptops now that have a pull out second screen but it seems to be an expensive option that leaves no other features like the iPad (or another tablet) does.iPads also have a lot of other fun features besides providing you with more screen real-estate when you aren't doing homework or programming!The End*I am a fan of Apple, have been since the early 90's when in 1st grade I was blown away by the amazing Oregon Trail (yes I know it was MECC software) on the IIGS in all it's green glory. I now own many Apple products. I am also a fan of Microsoft, work on Win XP and 7 at work everyday and have no issues with Windows. I also play pretty hard on the Xbox 360 in my down time. I use Google's services across multiple platforms. I run Win7 and OSX on my Apple laptop. I run Linux, although not as much as the other operating systems.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2 is great
Reviews.Author: André
Reviews.Content: This was my first apple product and I have no doubt taht is an excelent product, it is much better then I expected and Amazon service is also great.

Reviews.Title: Just upgrade from iPad 1, Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Simo Alvarez
Reviews.Content: It has been very nice doing business with you. Item arrived on time and as told. By the way, lovely product.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: Paula
Reviews.Content: I like this very much ordering was easy and quick, received in a timely manner.  Company processed order quickly and effectively love the product.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 (16GB, WiFi + 3G)
Reviews.Author: DanielSilva
Reviews.Content: Regarding the store, everything was more than OK. Really fast sipping. I really recomend it. Regarding the product, is unbelievable how you can use iPad 2 for business, enterteinement and D2D needs. I'm very satisfied with my recent aquisition.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Bernadette A. Moyer
Reviews.Content: My iPad has replaced my desk top my net book and is the fastest easiest to use! Portable convenient and perfect for quick info, social networking, music and movies. Easy to set up and fun to use. My first ever apple product. Love it and highly recommend it. I thought my Droid was cool but this is great!

Reviews.Title: Fun with my iPad
Reviews.Author: Birgit Ladet
Reviews.Content: My iPad is really fun to work with, the only problem I had was that I had downloaded NOOK ebooks while I was in the US, but forgot to download the link that enables me to read them. As I live in Europe, I can't download that link. Also I find that there are certain apps that don't work in Europe.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 is so sweet.
Reviews.Author: RichieRich
Reviews.Content: iPad 2 makes reading fun again. This is a must-have product. Simplifies my life while making news, education, books, and lifestyle easily accessible.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this purchase!  The shipping wasn't fast, but I requested super saver shipping.  I love using it!  I has almost totally replaced my computer!  It is incredibly easy to use.

Reviews.Title: iPad or computer?
Reviews.Author: Makayla
Reviews.Content: This thing is all some! If i had to chose from this or a computer I would chose this ( the IPad 2).

Reviews.Title: Love my Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: J. Bryan Turner "JBT"
Reviews.Content: I've only had my Ipad 2 a month so far but I love it and it's quickly become my favorite gadget  Thanks amazon

Reviews.Title: Does what it should....
Reviews.Author: cindleonion
Reviews.Content: I bought the Ipad with the intent of playing some of the internet games I play on my HP.  I found out that they are not compatible in this arena, so I was disappointed.  It does however fill all other responsibilities that I use a computer for.  It is light weight and holds a charge for a very long while.  It is great as long as you don't expect to use it  far all of your HP abilities.

Reviews.Title: I love it but .....
Reviews.Author: lizgro
Reviews.Content: I love the item but three weeks in I am already having problems with it. It is doing crazy things. Not letting me return by using the home button, when I am in e-mail and deleting it kicks me out! I have already been on the phone with Apple and believe I will have to return the item for repair or replacement. When I contacted manjatech thru amazon where it was purchased. they did not want anything to do with me after 15 days. And of course it took more than 15 days for me to get the product and really start using it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect !!!
Reviews.Author: Anup S. Nair
Reviews.Content: Have used the ipad 2 for couple of months. I must say, its a master piece. I have the 16GB white, Wifi+3g I use it for books, movies, games, news, banking, YouTube, surfing, location specific services, meetings, presentations, notes, comics, baby entertainment etc.The real estate is just right, extremely portable, the user interface design is very intuitive and simple, the apps are outstanding. The 32 pin connector takes care of most of the connectivity requirements if you buy the right connector.

Reviews.Title: Cool gadget, isn't it!
Reviews.Author: Key
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone 4, but it's screen is not wide enough to enjoy many US TV shows that are available online.  With Apple's iPad 2, I am really enjoying them, although I can not see a full episode since they are limited to the States and it's territories.  What a shame!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic ipad2
Reviews.Author: Kathy A. Warren "writer"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  It took me a while to figure it out, but now I have no problems.  It's a computer in a tablet!  I love it!

Reviews.Title: iPad2
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: For a month and a half it was great. Then I had connectivity issue. Apple was great and I am currently awaiting a replacement. Verizon iPads, iPods and iPhones do not have SIM cards, they have their own little server. I believe that was the problem. It fried. Take out the service contract. It is well worth it. Priority service.

Reviews.Title: Lemon
Reviews.Author: RONALD FARRUGGIA
Reviews.Content: Constant issues with charging. Left several messages with seller, with no response. Have to play with cord and sometimes it charges, sometimes it don't. Not happy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Cliff Lohner
Reviews.Content: What can I say.  Its an Ipad.  Had no issues with it and its still working perfectly.  I previously had a 16 gb but it didn't have enough memory so I got the 64 gb.  I currently have I think around 6000 songs and 22 movies on there and I still have like 20 gb free...  Good buy...

Reviews.Title: Beware...
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: Was listed as "brand new and factory sealed". It came in the package open and non functional. (gray screen). It was also shipped without a charger. Buyer did refund money but was adimate that this item was brand new. Had a hard time communicating with them as well. Would not recommend them to a friend

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed .....
Reviews.Author: Ms. Tee
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because I purchased this iPad with the impression that there was nothing wrong with it . Though it has no scratches the camera ( the most important part) doesn't work . My son was very dissapointed about this on Christmas . There was nothing written in the review about the camera not working ( I would have never purchased if it was stated ) now apple wants 250.00 to fix the problem.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: P.A. McMichael
Reviews.Content: It has all the features I was looking for in a tablet and for a used item it's in great shape.

Reviews.Title: A very nice used ipad.  The seller was prompt in mailing it.  Goodd service.
Reviews.Author: Sue K. Nadeau "still reading and learning"
Reviews.Content: I didn't realize I need more memory for what I do.  combined with my iphone and Kindle, I really don't need the ipad.  I am considering re-selling it.

Reviews.Title: Great except Home button after yr 2
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: I loved it. I've had it for about 2.5 years and it's been great...though the Home button has lost it's sensitivity and I have to push it hard to register. I've heard others with this model have the same problem.

Reviews.Title: IPAD Camara does not work!
Reviews.Author: Pam Heinz
Reviews.Content: The Camara on this device does not work; I don't live near an apple store and of course it is too late to return so I am out of luck!

Reviews.Title: Just not for me
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: I mainly use my lap top for playing games and reading emails but wanted something smaller and lighter so tried the ipad.  It is smaller and lighter but I found I could not play most of my games as it does not support Adobe. So I traded it to my daughter and she loves it.  So I guess in the end it worked out okay but it just wasn't for me.

Reviews.Title: Had do drop a few stars
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I've had my iPad 2 for a while now and I used to love it. It had a very crisp and unique look, functioned smoothly, and took care of all my entertainment needs. Then I turn it on one day and see I have an update. iOS 7...Since the update I feel robbed and cheated. Even the simplest of functions(like typing in a 4 digit password) have a lag/delay. The "new and improved" graphic design is a total disaster. It looks like a 5 year old was asked to replicate the look of a windows tablet.Would you like to watch a movie or tv show on your iPad with iOS 7? If you said yes then you'd better grab a pair of oven mitts to hold it with. That's right-now the back gets scalding hot after 30 minutes using it.Finally we get to the battery life. I spent around 10 minutes writing this review and in that time the battery has gone from 91% down to 83%. Before the update a single charge would last almost an entire week of medium/light use.My mother has the same issues with her iPad so it's not that mine is faulty or defective. I want to stress that my problems have been more with the update to iOS 7 than with the iPad itself. If these issues are resolved then I will edit my review and my rating, but as of right now I can't recommend this product to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Myreview
Reviews.Author: Lady Daniels
Reviews.Content: The best investment I did in purchasing IPad 2. This is great for easy access to internet and program of value various apps I uses.

Reviews.Title: The IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Beverly Redd
Reviews.Content: We enjoy this IPad 2 and so do our grandchildren..We have to hide it from them to get to use it ourselves..

Reviews.Title: Best tablet computer ever!
Reviews.Author: Trinette Rani Johnson "Trinette R Johnson"
Reviews.Content: I love the iPad 2. It's great for games,music,photos,and the internet. I use mine more than my computer now. iCloud is great and backs up all my data. Me.com email/webmail is awesome too! App store and iTunes work great for downloads of great media.I 'm gonna get a iPad 2 again in black as well.

Reviews.Title: Usual iPad
Reviews.Author: A. sethi "dieselx"
Reviews.Content: Why was 2nd generation iPad not loaded with ios 6. Otherwise no problems encountered. It has a nice sleek lightweight design.

Reviews.Title: The best!!!
Reviews.Author: Ingrid E Connelly
Reviews.Content: Apple products are excellent. I do like this iPad. This will be used by a friend of mine- he has not yer received it, however' I know he will certainly love it.

Reviews.Title: Love the iPad 2
Reviews.Author: tika
Reviews.Content: The iPad two is great! It has a great 9 inch screen which is easy to carry around but not too small so you can see things very easily on it. It also has the option of choosing a different color which is great. All other tablets only come in black but I love the option of being able to choose a different color. It is light weight for its size and has great battery life. I recommend buying one today! :)

Reviews.Title: They lied about the Apple Care
Reviews.Author: Crystal A. Wright
Reviews.Content: The ipad is beautiful. Works perfectly, however I chose this ipad from this seller because the description said that the ipad was covered under applecare.Upon receipt, I couldn't find any applecare contract.I emailed REPEATEDLY and asked how long remained on the agreement. While they responded, they NEVER answered that question and just kept saying things like:On 8/17/12 12:10 PM, "Nimlow Electronics - Amazon Marketplace"<[e-mail address removed]> wrote:Hi, Apple only needs the serial numbers on the back of the iPad for AppleCare.-----------On 8/18/12 8:58 AM, "Nimlow Electronics - Amazon Marketplace"<[e-mail address removed]> wrote:You only need the serial number for warranty, I have gotten warranty manytimes for my macbook pro. It doesn't need to be registered to your name.---------------On 8/19/12 2:52 PM, "Nimlow Electronics - Amazon Marketplace"<[e-mail address removed]> wrote:you can check the warranty expiration on apple website using the serialnumberWhen I called Apple, I found out from apple that it was the orig manu warranty & there was 100 days left. But No APPLECARE at all, which includes phone and in person customer support.So I just paid $79.00 for Apple Care.It's hard to do business with people that you cannot trust. Be careful with this company.

Reviews.Title: The pad
Reviews.Author: Miss Vee
Reviews.Content: This is  a very  nice  ipad very easy to carry around expecially when you are traveling around i would recommand this item for everyone to buy.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: Dennis P. Demarco "D P DEMARCO"
Reviews.Content: Got the ipad very quickly.  It works terrific & I'm very happy.  Only thing is, I wish it had vibrate set-up as I am deaf.  Thank you for being very professional about the sale & delivery.

Reviews.Title: I love it when things work the way they'r supposed to...
Reviews.Author: quotetaker "Tom Morrow"
Reviews.Content: Having purchased two new I-Pads from Apple, I later purchased a "refurbished" I-Pad-2 for a friend. It was delivered on the date it was promised and, for the past month, it has worked the way it supposed to work. He's extremely happy, and, of course, so am I. There are two purchase points I have steadily had positive results: Amazon.com and Apple. They do exactly as they promise and their stuff works the way advertised!

Reviews.Title: IPad2
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: I purchased the IPad2 after reading several reviews about the new Ipad's internet connection issue. IPad2's setup was very easy. I already have an ITunes account so it took minutes to get started. It took less then 5 minutes to get my secured internet connection working. I was disappointed that I can not play any games through my steam account. The application only lets me chat with other users so hopefully steam will provide an application that allows you to play your purchased games using IPad. I really like being able to use Kindle's and Overdrive's readers in order to read ebooks. I plan to install VMWare on the machine so I can use it to work with .net applications.

Reviews.Title: From Toy to Tool
Reviews.Author: Kenneth A. Ingold
Reviews.Content: I bought the iPad 2 after I had accidentally sat on my Kindle on an airplane and needed to make a decision - do I replace the Kindle or go with the iPad.  I had always told my wife that her iPad was little more than a toy, but once I got mine, my world began to change.  Sure, I have 40+ games downloaded, so I definitely enjoy the "toy" factor, but I also use it to take notes at meetings, keep up to date on emails and have even used "docs to go" for verbal presentations.  It has become an awesome tool in my life.

Reviews.Title: I pad
Reviews.Author: coop
Reviews.Content: The I pad two has been such a wonderful tool for my students.  I work I six different schools and having this is easy to transport and so versatile .  Thanks so much!

Reviews.Title: Simply awesome.
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take on a trip and love having access to e-books, my email and other things. Much more lightweight than my laptop and way less cumbersome. Since there is WIFI everywhere now, I don't use the Verizon service much, but if I need its there :-). Just a really great product!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed in myself
Reviews.Author: daisygirl
Reviews.Content: I purchased a refurbished Ipad2 and loved it until I realized I made a mistake by not getting the one with the +3g.  I now find out that I cannot get a internet connection through a provider so I cannot take it on the road or anywhere they do not have WIFI.  I still love the IPAD2....I just wish I would have investigated more into the product.  Hope this helps someone else from making the same mistake.

Reviews.Title: Convenient
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: It help ipad stand steadily. Before this, I usually got sore with my neck. Keyboard is very useful while write a letter or a document.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Drago1981
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with it.Wish I had two :) Terrific product for web surfing and music .I am ihappy with my iPad :)

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: fatidan
Reviews.Content: I am in Afghanistan working and my wife skypes our son's sports to me with the ipad and she loves it . Thank you !My kids love playing with it and it is portable more so than a laptop we set up hotspot with iphone and instant internet.

Reviews.Title: the best grown-up toy evah!
Reviews.Author: jvm
Reviews.Content: surprisingly lite, expremely fast and tons of fun. i caught myself playing a lego game which was meant for my kiddos. my kids weren't right for netflix, and enjoyed the portability of the ipad from play area to play area.

Reviews.Title: Amazing  Product
Reviews.Author: Noel0069
Reviews.Content: This tablet works like a dream I am able to run my company's paper work right off with out any problem. I am able to sign contracts edit and e-mail, this tablet is the best thing that has happened to the buisness industry.

Reviews.Title: Good product, arrived early
Reviews.Author: Jamal
Reviews.Content: Product received early and in excellent shape.. certainly exceeded my expectations. The iPad is great and exactly as perscribed. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Novagoth
Reviews.Content: Ive had my Ipad2 for 3 weeks now and found that i cant put it down. I aldready have the Iphone 4 and the Ipod touch 16 gig model. What i love about apple is the inner connectivity between all 3 products. Icloud hasnt been a disappointment and love all the great apps. Its very customizable to fit all your needs and has really improved my daily living. though id like to have gotten the higher storage model for the storage but the price is very high. The cameras are great and takes great pictures. resolution for gaming is great and video chat has worked well with staying in contact with family and friends. the Ipad is a great size and very convienant to carry. i used to carry a large laptop everywhere. it was very heavy and alot to set up. This has made life alot easier and travel alot more plesant. Ive been very happy with apple products and look forward to the future and thier new systems

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Haseena
Reviews.Content: After five months of using a 16GB iPad 2 WiFi (no 3G), I can honestly say that it is one of the most useful technology purchases I can think of. While its price may be a little expensive I defiantly think it's worth every penny.Part of the reason the iPad  is perfect for travel is that you can use it in any position, unlike a laptop, where you have to find a seat It won't ever got hot or overheat. Personally, I've had a couple laptops expire on me due to overheating. You always have to keep them on a firm surface so you don't block the vents. The iPad doesn't have these problems. You no longer have to grab a tray or giant book to set your laptop on when using it in bed.Video Skype works great on this tablet - the cameras make showing people things FAR simpler due to the front and back placement.The battery life is excellent! This thing can go for two days without a recharge! And that's with fairly heavy usage (try that with a laptop!)The touchscreen is extremely responsive, the machine is very fast - wifi works extremely well.The only issue I have is the reflective screen - I am not a fan of the reflective screen and have ordered a matte screen protector - not because I feel it needs protecting, but because I want to be able to read in various lighting conditions.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable!!!
Reviews.Author: mate
Reviews.Content: I was not sure if I'm gonna get a black or white but I'm very glad I got the white cuz it's really coooool!!

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, hice mi compra desde Venezuela y el aparato llego a tiempo y en perfecto estado, altamente recomendado el vendedor.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: CRiley10
Reviews.Content: My husband ordered this item (iPad 2, 16gb, black) for work. He loves it. We still have been unable to update it to iOS 5 because our wifi kept disconnecting on wifi on laptop but I think when we do that it will be faster. First day he had some slowness but not everything is great. We looked at getting some of the tablets on the android market and went to best buy to review. I liked the idea because the androids are more customizable but had reservations because 1. They are about the same price as iPads 2. Wasn't sure if I wanted to take that risk. 3. I have iPhones and know how dependable they are. However I found the toshiba thrive and it was cheaper. So that was our main focus. Toshiba thrive vs. iPad 2. On one hand the toshiba had USB ports, sd card ports and customization options, on the other if was not familiar with it. So we tried them both at best buy. Toshiba thrive looked better. It's graphics looked more fun, apps are cheaper..mostly free and all that. But it was more complicated, which i love because I like to tween things. My husband on the other hand...does not. So he wanted iPad...I wanted toshiba thrive but we wanted to talk to somebody who knew more about it. So we grabbed a guy who only deals with tablets. He said he has an android phone and likes it but as far as tablets go he said hands down iPad won. Reason was that apple makes one specific hardware for iPads. So they had it perfected. All their apps and music were specifically made for apple hardware so it had very little problems. Android market on the other hand is made from many different tablets, that are all made by different hardware. Therefore, if an app is made on a toshiba thrive, it may work great, but if you download it for your samsung thrive, the hardware is different so you are going to have more freezes with all, crashes or lack of working at all.In conclusion, iPad 2 so far is more dependable and perfected. I do believe however, with time, the android market will be more perfected. As of now, I am siticking with my iPad 2!

Reviews.Title: Great for business purposes
Reviews.Author: Tailgater
Reviews.Content: I am pretty new to this tablet market but after having this iPad for about a week. I am for the most part impressed.Packaging: Apple has always impressed when it comes to their packaging. The box is very sleek and makes you very happy with your purchaseSetup: Now since this is only the wifi version, it doesn't require much setup.Now after everything was setup, I had fun connecting downloading all the apps and seeing what neat things I could do with it. I have an iPhone so I was apply to move over all my photos, songs, files, etc to the iPad and it was very easy. The plan for this iPad is to use in meetings and allow the customers to flip through the pictures or files that I am showing.Downfalls: The issues I have been having with this is that since I only have an iPhone 3GS, the tethering (personal hotspot) can only be connect through bluetooth so the internet isn't as fast as through wifi. I also wish there was some sort of case that comes with the iPad. I had to spend an additional $50 for a case to protect it. The front cases that Apple make I find are not helpful at all in terms of protection so I wish Apple would offer a better of assortment of accessories rather than having to buy 'made for the ipad' products.Overall I am quite happy and am enjoying the iPad. I do quite a bit of flying so this will make my flights more enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: Love my I Pad
Reviews.Author: Jack S
Reviews.Content: 1. I love this new toy of mine, I can sit around being lazy and surf the web or do my emails. Oh yea...the family that did not think they would like it......just say we fight over it now. Buying it through Amazon was a breeze, got it quick with no problems. I even used my credit card points to pay for it with ease. Get one for you!

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!!
Reviews.Author: LCR "keyteacher"
Reviews.Content: I am more than pleased with my new ipad2.  I struggled with the decision to buy it but it was a good decision.One unexpected plus was I found it was so easy to use the free Kindle app to move all my Kindle books over to the iPad.  Now I can read from either device and my husband and  I don't fight over the Kindle anymore.One negative is that I was  surprised and disappointed that there was no user's manual included.  At the price one pays I think it is pretty cheap of Apple to not include a manual . . . What other device or piece of equipment that costs $600+ doesn't come with instructions for use?

Reviews.Title: I love my I pad
Reviews.Author: Jessica S. Madden "jmadsnowco"
Reviews.Content: Who can not love the easiest of all computers. this is an I phone but bigger .. Thank you for making it not ring .. Lol .. I got the I phone then the I pad .. Now everything in this house is Mac product ., I have no need for a Pc anymore make is so much easier no I am not a computer guru. I am computer illiterate and I find Mac is way easier to use.. Thank you Mac I am a huge fan

Reviews.Title: amazing but...
Reviews.Author: Jalali,Haitham
Reviews.Content: I have the ipad 2  for a month now . Its an amazing device the style , wieght and size r amazing . the device is great in everything  but the still camera is absolutly garbage ,apple shouldve done better job in this area and one morething the screen shouldve been ratina like the iphone. anyway to me if u have ipad one dont upgrade to ipad 2 wait for 3 but if u dont u really shoud get one .

Reviews.Title: IPAD 2 3g WIFI
Reviews.Author: I. Lenmark "Forevermore"
Reviews.Content: I love my IPAD 2! I can't leave our house without this wonderful device. It meets my need to be connected, for reading and most of all books and apps for my little one. I'm glad I waited for the IPAD 2, it's thinner and lighter than the first gen. I'm hoping it will also be helpful for when I start grad school. I can't wait to get my Piel Frama folio case which will be the home and protection of my IPAD 2.

Reviews.Title: Too many problems
Reviews.Author: Dennis Kenney "DJ"
Reviews.Content: My daughter wanted one for Christmas and leap before I looked. The biggest problem is using the payment system for buying apps, movies, etc.. Just google it and you will find the problems are widespread. It won't accept giftcards type credit cards after the first one. They try to force you to use a credit card with large ranges so they can charge you up like cell phone companies do. I will never trust their products ever again and look forward to getting rid of this piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: I really don't like this IPad
Reviews.Author: Donna L.
Reviews.Content: I am sorry that I got this IPad. I wished I would have gotten an android. This IPad doesn't do what I expect of it. Also it is nothing like my LapTop. There was no directions to this stupid thing and that is discouraging. I wished I would also got something that you can insert a scan disk card. I wouldn't recommend it unless you like Apple.and know how to operate it.

Reviews.Title: I love anything apple
Reviews.Author: Bailey Pappas "BaileyP"
Reviews.Content: Apple has done it again. People all over the world love Macs, Ipods, iPhones, and iPads. I love my iPad 2! I use it just like a regular laptop...Since I can run windows 7 I am able to run programs on it now..... : ) Because programs give you more control than apps, am I correct? & I surf the web, play games, and more. <3 You Steve Jobs!!!!

Reviews.Title: best product ever!!
Reviews.Author: namoola
Reviews.Content: i have an iPad 2 , i use it lots of times! it makes me feel special to have it, i got many games on it, i share and play with my friends and family ,it is so thin that i ant travel with it .

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Georgia Shopper
Reviews.Content: Nothing negative can be said about this product. Great item, arrived within days of order in perfect condition.  Ready to use right out of the box.  Great experience from this supplier.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful toy and cyber-companion
Reviews.Author: Dan Elliott Jr.
Reviews.Content: My i Pad is a wonderful product, I am happy I bought it.It is easy to use, as intuitive as can be, and is a delight to own and use.So far, (two weeks after delivery), I ha ve downloaded a few games, plus chess, and a book, plus my subscription to two magazines.The iPad is kind of like a cyber-friend, it is there at the ready to play or do whatever, just like a happy puppy.  As a matter-of-fact, were I in charge of product-naming at Apple, this thing would have been named the iPuppy, it is just a fun creation all the way.Had I to do it again, I would repeat the purchase.Dan Elliott Jr.

Reviews.Title: What can I say that hasn't been said already?
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: Great product, very addictive, I have move all the things that I wasn't suppose to do in my laptop to the iPad 2 (internet browsing, personal email, pictures, movies, calendars, TV, news, e-Books, etc) it seems just like the right device for it, so now my laptop is only for work.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: ***** NEW IPAD2 $498.88  *****
Reviews.Author: Joe Gump "Joe Gump"
Reviews.Content: I just received a new IPAD2 delivered for $510.90.I looked at Amazon no luck.  I tried Ebay, no luck. I tried Apple.com, Apple Store, and Best Buy.On Google I found J&R.com.;  Jaques at ext.1015 sold me a new iPad2 in black.  I paid $498.88 plus $12.02 for two-day UPS.  The iPad2 arrived in two weeks.  I paid no sales tax and no CA recycle fee.  They sell all models.This was a great experience.  Since then, I bought an easy set-up Medialink wireless router, a bargain Casecrown protective case, and a couple capacitive pens, all from Amazon. Everything a great deal.  Also, check out Amazon's price on the AppleCare Protection Plan.

Reviews.Title: best product ever!!
Reviews.Author: namoola
Reviews.Content: i have an iPad 2 , i use it lots of times! it makes me feel special to have it, i got many games on it, i share and play with my friends and family ,it is so thin that i ant travel with it .

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Georgia Shopper
Reviews.Content: Nothing negative can be said about this product. Great item, arrived within days of order in perfect condition.  Ready to use right out of the box.  Great experience from this supplier.

Reviews.Content: My i Pad is a wonderful product, I am happy I bought it.It is easy to use, as intuitive as can be, and is a delight to own and use.So far, (two weeks after delivery), I ha ve downloaded a few games, plus chess, and a book, plus my subscription to two magazines.The iPad is kind of like a cyber-friend, it is there at the ready to play or do whatever, just like a happy puppy.  As a matter-of-fact, were I in charge of product-naming at Apple, this thing would have been named the iPuppy, it is just a fun creation all the way.Had I to do it again, I would repeat the purchase.Dan Elliott Jr.

Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: Great product, very addictive, I have move all the things that I wasn't suppose to do in my laptop to the iPad 2 (internet browsing, personal email, pictures, movies, calendars, TV, news, e-Books, etc) it seems just like the right device for it, so now my laptop is only for work.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Content: I just received a new IPAD2 delivered for $510.90.I looked at Amazon no luck.  I tried Ebay, no luck. I tried Apple.com, Apple Store, and Best Buy.On Google I found J&R.com.;  Jaques at ext.1015 sold me a new iPad2 in black.  I paid $498.88 plus $12.02 for two-day UPS. Also, check out Amazon's price on the AppleCare Protection Plan.

Reviews.Title: Powerful iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Abbas Fathy
Reviews.Content: I owned iPad 1 but, I was surprised when iPad 2 comes out. I was in need for more speed, camera, more battery life (10 hours) and more monitor resolution. Now, I have more satisfaction but still we are in need for Flash module and more development to let us use it instead of our laptop. I am using it for my project management work, some photo / movie editing, emails, presentation, Internet browsing, to do list calendar, friends caring, Facebook, and more. I compared it with motorols Xoom tablet but, I choosed the iPad 2. I love iPad 2 and I have a lot of ideas for it's required development and I hope to get a Chanel to communicate with Apple the greatest company around the world. Also, I have the Mac mini iPod and iPhone. I recommend the iPad 2 as the best tablet in the market.

Reviews.Title: damaged product
Reviews.Author: Tara Nevola
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Apple iPad 2, and received it rater quickly, within three days.  However when I went to sync it and also connect it with my wi-fi, it wouldn't connect or Sync.  I immediately brought it to apple and they said it was an internal error, a glitch.  After trying to manipulate the iPad to work, they eventually gave me a brand new one.  Thankfully, being Apple and standing behind their product 100% I received a new working iPad.

Reviews.Title: Get a netbook or a palm pilot (if you can find one)
Reviews.Author: Charlene Sanders "Htuna2"
Reviews.Content: I received this from my employer.Here are my observationsPros:LightweightPortableSurf InterneteReaderCons:Device is slippery - definitely need case or other backing or it could easily be droppedScreen can easily be scratched  unless you have a stand or some way of keeping it off your deskKeyboard is lacking tab, arrow keys,  switching between letters and numbers/symbols is inconceivable for a device you type on.  3rd keyboard for  special characters, keyboard covers up screen. During online chat the chat window from agent disappeared when I started typing.Making corrections to this review I can't scroll down to information I already typed.  No arrow keys,  had to preview then edit, the hit return then delete returns.Hard to place cursor between letters even using a stylusIn app store some games say they are free but eventually you must buy to continue.  Many of the thousands of apps are games and not many useful apps for business.Hard to scroll in form (like this on).  Every time I try to place the cursor I get a pop to cut, copy etcReading books hard because thumb placement on device can inadvertently turn pages or other thumb can take you out of book and to the desktop. Also must hold iPad to read comfortably.Battery life is okay but I expected more (been using for 2 hours am down to 63% from fully charged, now down to 54%You need a computer as you have to sync with iTunes.  Also, have not found a way to delete apps off iPad without iTunesNo USB ports, only expandable through mini sdLarge for everyday use and since back is so slippery is hard to hold securely unless you have a case.Conclusion:The more I use it the less I like it.This doesn't do much more than a Palm Pilot and the palm can fit easily in your pocket or purse, has onscreen keyboard, graffiti, wifi, sd slot, Bluetooth, real word and excel software, email, built-in calculator, eReader, music, etc.  Too bad they are no longer available except on eBay.However, if you want a 10" screen then a netbook is much more useful.  A real OS, flash support, large hard drive, screen can be adjusted for optimal viewing, USB ports, and the list goes on.  Portability is not much different and you can get a lot more for your money.  Price is another plus.I would never have bought this for myself.  As I finish this the battery is at 56%.  Typing this has been tedious and draining.

Reviews.Title: Awesome and Useless, At The Same Time!
Reviews.Author: brYsturr
Reviews.Content: While the iPad 2 is indeed the coolest gadget to own at the moment, it hardly does anything productively. This is not to say I do not love my iPad 2. I use it to watch Netflix, type company notes, play games, and occasionally listen to music on it. That is precisely where I find the problem. I use it to do things I do perfectly fine on a computer or laptop. I can watch Netflix, take notes, game, music on my computer and it does an even better job! The truth is, I often have to find an excuse to use my iPad 2 instead of getting on my laptop.So why iPad 2? Because it's a luxury item and everything looks more beautiful on an iPad 2. At least that's what you'll convince yourself, well, I did...

Reviews.Title: DO NOT PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM THIS SELLER..
Reviews.Author: LucyLoo
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Apple iPad 2 from this seller, and come to find out that it was locked, so I was unable to gain access, and use this item. After taking it to the Apple store, I found out that the serial numbers on the item, and on the box did not match, and they were VERY hesitant to touch it.. considering that it may have been stolen. The seller was contacted and refused to do anything to reimburse me for the upwards of $400 + that I have spent.I caution anyone who is considering purchasing an electronic item, to first, consider buying it new, and DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THIS SELLER..! whatsoever..

Reviews.Title: It's an overpriced/oversized iPod touch...
Reviews.Author: H. Ricks
Reviews.Content: ...but I love it!I was skeptical at first for getting one because the specs didn't/doesn't seem to justify the price.  I have a laptop, desktop and a very good Android phone so I didn't really need this.  But I've owned many Apple products (Macs and iPods) too, but never an iOS device.  So, as a birthday gift, I wanted to splurge (haha).Not to sound like an Apple ad/fanboy (or SJ-RIP), but I do like its `convenience.' I like that I can `lounge' with this instead of being at my desktop, having to deal with the bulk of a laptop or the small size (and power) of my smartphone.  The touchscreen is very responsive and the image quality (be it pictures, web pages, video-especially HBO) is great.  There is little to understand or setup (except connecting it to your wifi, if you got a wifi only; if you know/use Apple, Android or Windows, you'll figure it out easily).  I got a 32 gig because I wasn't sure what my ratio would be for apps vs. media/pic content (even with Apple's cloud service).Granted, it has some limitations (be it lack of `flash,' getting used to the onscreen keyboard and some multi-tasking capabilities), but its conveniences do make up in its usefulness (that is, if you use it for web surfing, checking email, using apps, etc).  I've had to stop myself at times from saying `I'm doing those things on such a thin device'-haha.I'll say that this is a very good `half-top,' that is, half a desktop/laptop.  It isn't to replace my computer or smartphone, but I do find myself using this more in leisure than my actual computer (haha).  I know there are less expensive tablets and/or tablets with better software/hardware specs.  But this device is a delight to have when/if you don't want to use your smartphone or computer.

Reviews.Title: The Best yet
Reviews.Author: A. Fleming
Reviews.Content: This is by far my favorite toy.  It's more usesr freindly and even more helpful for almost everything I want it for, except the portability issue since theiPod touch fits in your pocket but leaving that aside, it's really mobile, you can take it with you everywhere. This product has literally helped me get over my Ex. Ipad 2 is so much more than just a lareger ipod toch instrument.  People making such claims dont seem to have used one. I agree that because applications are similar and they both share the same iOS, the experience might not seem that different, but once you get your hands on it, the bigger screen, the dual core processor, larger memory and longer battery so I like it better.

Reviews.Title: Good Jobs
Reviews.Author: Thanos
Reviews.Content: Great product exactly as they promote it. What you see is beyond what you expect to see. Something not so good connectivity with pc (file exchange).

Reviews.Title: Teribble antialiasing - cannot read PDFs at all.
Reviews.Author: uzevla
Reviews.Content: The pixel density on this tablet is good enough to get good smoothing of the font edges. Yet, the iOS doesn't do well here. In result, reading PDFs is impossible as it causes some serious strain on my eyes. I have 20" LCD HP crap that has ~3 less pixel density. Yet, the font edges are as good as on this IPAD. Huh.I see IPAD3 fixes this problem, but not in the iOS but with better screen - good for marketing since not many people even see any difference. In fact, people say the screen is not worth it. Huh. Makes me think if I got the eagle eyes or maybe there is a few million people who simply don't know nothing.If you don't need PDF, well, letters in Safari are terrible too.Also, I cannot believe there is no LED behind the Home button. There is even that dark square in it where LED could fit (like on HP touchpad). So, carrying it next to me, like iPhone, and checking email frequently is the way to go? That's ridiculous. If I am not using it, it's on the stand, not withing my reach. That's where LED comes handy.Also, when I click on Mail icon that shows new email, it opens inbox, instead the email. - few clicks more are needed to see the email. Terrible approach if you plan to use multiple accounts and receive many emails.Finally, Notification bar is not popping-up new messages when I am working on ipad. Why? Status bar is there all the time - showing some small icon when new message arrives would be completely unobtrusive.In summary, message/email communication interface is years behind Android. And yet, all that is needed are few minor changes.I was hopping that external adapter can serves as additional storage. At least read-only. But no, you can only import stuff from there. Import where? To 16GB memory? From HD camera? Ridiculous.

Reviews.Title: Over-rated but OK
Reviews.Author: hjgreg
Reviews.Content: I own a Nook Tablet, Kindle Fire and an ipad2.I would have to guess that most of the people that rate the ipad2 5 stars have not tried other tablets,Maybe you will like the ipad -- it has more apps in its store, but it also is slow compared to my Kindle Fireand lacks the customization options of Android,Apple products I have owned have malfunctioned after a few years (2 if my 4 itouchs')Not having Flash Video is a major shortcoming -- most videos online are flash -- so you will be disappointed when videosdon't play.Ipad does have a nice big screen, but no USB port, no memory card slot, average cameras and a VERY HIGH price.I bought mine because of the hype and I was curious.My advice is to check them all out before you buy - I would not have bought mine -- it is OK but over-rated with many shortcomings

Reviews.Title: Neat but not very useful
Reviews.Author: B. Omdahl
Reviews.Content: After using the iPad 2 for about six months I can definitely say that I can't wait for the Windows 8 tablet to be released. The iPad 2 is a neat toy but it is too limitd to use for any productive purposes. Number one on the list is no Flash. I can't even tell you how many times I've had to put the iPad 2 aside and grab a Windows laptop to look at a Web page. At this point, if I want to be productive I grab a Windows laptop. If I want to play games I grab the iPad 2.

Reviews.Title: Why?
Reviews.Author: Random Walker
Reviews.Content: Why pay $450 here when you can get a refurbished iPad2 directly from Apple for the same price with Apple warranty, etc.?

Reviews.Title: Andriod Does...
Reviews.Author: AMGesus
Reviews.Content: I use my Xoom for grad school everyday and I love it!  Let me say that my wife has an iPad, and I like it too.  However, iOS feels like training wheels and Honeycomb feels like the real deal.  Android is more like an actual computer while iOS feels like (and is) a giant phone.  I can do things like download Power Points directly to my device and open them using Docs To Go.  What good are 10,000 apps if they are all games?!  I have not discovered anything yet that my iPad colleagues in school can do that I cannot with the Xoom, but only Android has widgets, multiple desktops, Google integration, the list goes on and on...  Honeycomb is getting new apps everyday and you are free of Apple's restrictive environment.  Plus, Ice Cream Sandwich is going to polish off Android and take it to the next level.  Take it from me, if you want open accessibility, maximum customization, and the slickest OS, you want Android.  MOTOROLA XOOM Android Tablet (10.1-Inch, 32GB, Wi-Fi)

Reviews.Title: Refurbished i-pad 2 purchased from Bargain Devices
Reviews.Author: Mirella Augusto
Reviews.Content: This is a refurbished item and it started having problems on the same day the return window expired; the rotation feature is broken and I will have to get it fixed at my cost because I have been unable to contact the vendor. When the item arrived it didn't include any type of warranty. So I now have a one month old i-pad that doesn't work properly. I am not prepared to give a positive review and I do not appreciate the difficulty in contacting the vendor directly. This is Bargain Devices, sponsored by Amazon.UPDATEActually it turns out that all I needed to do to correct this problem is to reset the i-pad to factory standards using i-tunes; the apple people were patient and helpful and it didn't take too long.  Apparently this is a common problem but fairly easy to solve. I am now very happy with my i-pad
